Heisenberg.Heisenberg2D#

class Heisenberg.Heisenberg2D(n, J, Jm, h, H_ajuste, T1, T2, T3)[source]#

Class for solving the 2D Heisenberg model.

Atributes:#

nint

Size of the lattice.

Jfloat:

Exchange coupling constant.

Jmfloat

Magnetostriction constant.

hlist

List of magnetic field values.

H_ajustenp.array

Magnetic field values for fitting.

T1float

Temperature 1.

T2float

Temperature 2.

T3float

Temperature 3.

Theta_quantumlist

List of quantum angles.

Theta_classiclist

List of classical angles.

__init__(n, J, Jm, h, H_ajuste, T1, T2, T3)[source]#

Initializes the Heisenberg2D object with the specified parameters.

Methods

Ein(mu, h_3)

Calculates the energy contribution of a spin with its neighboring spins.

Info(h_2, T, Theta)

Calculates the total energy, magnetization, and other information of the system.

__init__(n, J, Jm, h, H_ajuste, T1, T2, T3)

Initializes the Heisenberg2D object with the specified parameters.

mag_isotermas_classic()

Function to calculate and plot the magnetization evolution using the classical Heisenberg model.

mag_isotermas_quantum()

Plots the magnetization as a function of the magnetic field for the quantum Heisenberg model.

vecinosp(i, j)

Returns the neighboring spins of a spin at position (i, j).
